greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The exponent of the highest power of 7 dividing the product of the elements on the n-th row of Pascal's triangle.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2400
Jeffrey C. Lagarias, Harsh Mehta, Products of binomial coefficients and unreduced Farey fractions, arXiv:1409.4145 [math.NT], 2014.
program: (define (add intfun lowlim uplim) (let sumloop ((i lowlim) (res 0)) (cond ((> i uplim) res) (else (sumloop (+ 1 i) (+ res (intfun i)))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 28 2014
